LanguageData.ExposureVictim.title: Exposure victim
LanguageData.ExposureVictim.description: [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_objective]self too close to a mutanite meteorite and soon found [PAWN_possessive] life changed forever.
LanguageData.MutagenJunkie.title: Mutagen junkie
LanguageData.MutagenJunkie.description: [PAWN_nameDef] got addicted to the feeling of change and morphed [PAWN_objective]self repeatedly. [PAWN_pronoun] got clean, but the damage was permanent.
LanguageData.VolunteerMorph.title: Volunteer morph
LanguageData.VolunteerMorph.description: [PAWN_nameDef] signed up for a gene therapy programme, specifically designed to mutate him. It ended up working, but the results were slightly different to what he first expected.
LanguageData.WishFulfilment.title: Wishful morph
LanguageData.WishFulfilment.description: [PAWN_nameDef] found a lab willing to give [PAWN_objective] mutations [PAWN_pronoun] wanted. Whether the ones [PAWN_pronoun] got were them is another story.
LanguageData.TestSubject.title: Test subject
LanguageData.TestSubject.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by a rogue research organisation and mutated against [PAWN_possessive] will, changed into monstrosities and reverted many times over. The fragments of change still remain.
LanguageData.CombatMorph.title: Combat morph
LanguageData.CombatMorph.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was mutated to fight on the front lines of a faction war. During a ceasefire, [PAWN_pronoun] deserted to start [PAWN_possessive] own life.
LanguageData.ProductionMorph.title: Production morph
LanguageData.ProductionMorph.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was kept in a barn, forced to produce all manner of foodstuffs before [PAWN_pronoun] escaped by feeding the guards [PAWN_possessive] own brand of mutagens. This isolation has stymied [PAWN_possessive] social development, but [PAWN_pronoun] was sometimes called in to help with other...inmates.
LanguageData.CultEscapee.title: Cult escapee
LanguageData.CultEscapee.description: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to escape the grip of an oppressive mutation cult, and still has the scars to show for it.
LanguageData.CultEscapeeFarm.title: Cult farm escapee
LanguageData.CultEscapeeFarm.description: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to escape the grip of an oppressive mutation cult, and still has the scars to show for it.
LanguageData.ChookmorphGeneral.title: prize chicken
LanguageData.ChookmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the coop. [PAWN_pronoun] was allowed to leave once [PAWN_pronoun]'d "paid [PAWN_possessive] due."
LanguageData.TurkeymorphGeneral.title: turkey
LanguageData.TurkeymorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was genetically modified against [PAWN_pronoun] will to be used in a fancy meal by a rich cannibal.
LanguageData.DuckmorphChef.title: foodie
LanguageData.DuckmorphChef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a patron of a 5-star restaurant. After a mutagenic attack by an eco terrorist group, [PAWN_nameDef] was left looking like [PAWN_pronoun] should be served coated in an orange sauce.
LanguageData.GoosemorphPurist.title: anatidaephobe
LanguageData.GoosemorphPurist.description: After having a lakeside picnic ruined by geese, [PAWN_nameDef]'s peck injuries were infected with mutagenic pollution in the lake.
LanguageData.CassowarymorphGeneral.title: manhunter victim
LanguageData.CassowarymorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s previous colony was attacked by a group of manhunting cassowaries. After the attack, [PAWN_nameDef] woke up like this to a destroyed colony.
LanguageData.EmumorphGeneral.title: paleo enthusiast
LanguageData.EmumorphGeneral.description: When [PAWN_nameDef] agreed to genetic modification that would make them more like a dinosaur, this isn't what [PAWN_pronoun] had in mind.
LanguageData.OstrichmorphGeneral.title: track runner
LanguageData.OstrichmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a runner in desperate need of a 1st place trophy. Unfortunately, the performance enhancing drugs did more than just make [PAWN_nameDef] a better runner.
LanguageData.WolfmorphAlphaGeneral.title: pack alpha
LanguageData.WolfmorphAlphaGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a disproven study into the dominance heirarchy in wolf packs. When the study went underground, it took [PAWN_nameDef]'s humanity and made [PAWN_objective] an alpha.
LanguageData.WolfmorphBetaGeneral.title: pack beta
LanguageData.WolfmorphBetaGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a disproven study into the dominance heirarchy in wolf packs. When the study went underground, it took [PAWN_nameDef]'s humanity and made [PAWN_objective] a lesser member, a beta.
LanguageData.FoxmorphGeneral.title: hunted fox
LanguageData.FoxmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured by a twisted hunting club that chased people down with dogs, and was looking for a new spin on it. Fortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] became cunning enough to escape again.
LanguageData.CowmorphGeneral.title: dairy cow
LanguageData.CowmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the livestock. [PAWN_pronoun] was allowed to leave once [PAWN_pronoun]'d "paid [PAWN_possessive] due."
LanguageData.GoatmorphGeneral.title: rowdy goat
LanguageData.GoatmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] home and mutated by a cryptodemonic cult who worshipped a goatlike deity. [PAWN_pronoun] proved to be the Goatliest Of All Time and the cult couldn't handle [PAWN_pronoun], which provided a means to escape.
LanguageData.GoatmorphCultist.title: caprine cultist
LanguageData.GoatmorphCultist.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] life associated with an occult group who worshiped a goat-like deity. As soon as the cult got their hands on morph technology they immediately injected themselves in a pact-like mass transformation to bring themselves closer to their god. [PAWN_nameDef] was the only one left with measurable sapience and has been wandering since.
LanguageData.SheepmorphGeneral.title: farm sheep
LanguageData.SheepmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the sheep flock. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped before being shorn, and fled with [PAWN_possessive] fleece still on [PAWN_possessive] back.
LanguageData.BoarmorphGeneral.title: forest boar
LanguageData.BoarmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ate some suspect mushrooms next to a chemical spill in the woods, and found [PAWN_objective]self to be quite a bit more porcine.
LanguageData.PigmorphGeneral.title: farm pig
LanguageData.PigmorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made [PAWN_nameDef] part of the pig herd. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped during a prize show, just before [PAWN_pronoun] was awarded first place.
LanguageData.DonkeymorphGeneral.title: escaped donkey
LanguageData.DonkeymorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was mutated into a work-donkey at a less-than-reputable carnival, but was able to escape with some remnant of [PAWN_possessive] humanity intact.
LanguageData.HorsemorphGeneral.title: draft horse
LanguageData.HorsemorphGeneral.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a farmer with less-than-ethical business practices, and quickly made use of [PAWN_objective] to pull the ploughs and farm equipment there. [PAWN_pronoun] broke a leg and was sold off, where he made his escape en route to who-knows-where.
